Network connections to known cryptocurre.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log and dns.log for connections to IP addresses or domains on lists of known cryptocurrency mining pools. Analyze Zeek conn.log for unusual patterns in outbound connection volume and duration from individual hosts or groups of hosts (e.g., using time series analysis or outlier detection on bytes_sent/bytes_recv).

Detection of unauthorized process creati.Data: Windows Event ID 4688, Windows Event ID 4689
Detection of unauthorized process creati.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 (Process Creation) and 4689 (Process Termination). Create a baseline of normal process activity using descriptive statistics on process names and command lines. Identify process names or command lines matching known cryptocurrency miners or suspicious process termination events (e.g., termination of legitimate performance monitoring tools) using anomaly detection on process names/hashes/parent processes.
